NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: Is this the <color=orange>Second Locator</color> you mentioned to us, Plume?
2
1
PLUME: It is, but.. I fear it is a bit lacking in its function, compared to the locator on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin..</color>
3
2
PLUME: I have heard from Melorae that the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> tracks the precise position of the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon..</color> I fear this locator lacks such sophistication.
4 3
COLEUS: Ah, that is not what I was thinking, my friend. But..
5
4
COLEUS: Is there a reason this <color=orange>Second Locator</color> was built underground?
6
5
PLUME: Ah, that is because we needed to protect the <color=orange>Second Locator's</color> delicate sensors from meteor impacts, you see.
7
6
COLEUS: I see.. The issue is, a limited visibility of the sky makes it much harder to directly observe the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon.</color>
8
7
COLEUS: That is why we insisted on building the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin's</color> surface, despite the terrible heat on that planet's surface.
9
8
PLUME: I see.. In that case, it seems clear the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> would be the more ideal choice for tracking the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon.</color>
10
9
PLUME: I thank you for visiting the <color=orange>Second Locator</color> today, Coleus. Though, in hindsight, it is quite embarrassing how lacking our locator is in comparison!
11
10
COLEUS: Plume: there is no shame in learning from each other, and less for the circumstances we built them in! We simply adapted a similar idea to the conditions we faced on each planet.
12
11
COLEUS: Furthermore, this locator is quite helpful in indicating which planet the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> is orbiting without ambiguity.
13
12
COLEUS: But.. Yes, it would be more functional, if only it had a better view of the sky!
BH_QML EX1 6
BH_QML EX2 2
BH_QML EX3 6
BH_QML EX4 7
BH_QML R4 3
